abstract: NBA Roundup; Golden State Warriors defeat Minnesota Timberwolves, 129-116; other basketball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors improved to 10-0 on the season with a 129-116 victory over the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Thursday night.

headline.main: Stephen Curry Scores 46 to Lift Warriors to 10-0
headline.print_headline: Curry Scores 46 to Lift Warriors to 10-0

snippet: The Golden State Warriors improved to 10-0 on the season with a 129-116 victory over the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Thursday night.
